Key:
Bwahahaha, my dear brother. How am I going to best
adore you today?

Hm? Wait, we're in a classroom now... Whatever, I
don't mind the small details.

Assumption. Kaguya, I think it's already over. We
are back in reality, and this is our classroom.

Hey... Don't tell me, Yuzuru, you were my older
sister and Kaguya was my younger sister?

Was that really a dream? Do you guys ever question
that you're sharing the same dreams?
What do you mean? It happens to everyone.

Question. It makes sense for us, but how did you
know the content of our dreams?

Because I experienced something similar. It was
weird, but it wasn't exactly a dream...

Wait a minute! Sh-Shido, you know about that
dream, too?

Yeah. I think I saw the same exact thing. In the
bed, you two...

I-I didn't know about this! Th-That's so
embarrassing! Ahhhh!
Stop. Please wait, Kaguya. Don't leave Yuzuru.
